item.title: First arrest after high-value museum raid
item.description: Detectives are still hunting for four other suspects and have released new CCTV images.

item.title: Homicides at lowest level in nearly 50 years, ONS says
item.description: The 499 cases of murder and manslaughter in the year to September are the lowest in England and Wales since 1977.

item.title: Talks ramp up to avert US government shutdown after Minneapolis shooting
item.description: Democrats are pushing to remove funding for the Department of Homeland Security unless new measures are implemented.

item.title: Labour blocking my MP bid was hard to take, says Burnham
item.description: The Greater Manchester mayor said he would be campaigning in support of Labour in Gorton and Denton.

item.title: Number of term-time school holiday fines hits another record high
item.description: New government data shows that fines for term-time holidays have risen again in the last academic year.
